Freeroll - Poker

Published by Ted on 08 Jan 2019. Contains tags related to: freeroll  professional 

I am looking forward to another summer in Vegas. Don’t want to be too rusty. And recently I have been finding more and more reasons not to play.

So here is the freeroll. I need to play one hundred hours before June first. The plan is to have fun and play an hour a day after working to wind down.

I will post the receipts and results here.

Good luck us.
